Package index

All functions

Q0_Dist.01
Distribution table of enrichment test II p-value
Q0_Dist.05
Distribution table of enrichment test II p-value
T2DGWAS
Sample T2D-GWAS Data
T2DGWES
Sample T2D-GWES Data
aligator()
Pathway analysis by aligator
enrichTest1()
Pathway enrichment test I based on a given vector of candidate genes
enrichTest1_Perm()
Permutation analysis of the enrichment test I
enrichTest2()
Gene-set enrichment test II based on genome-wide study (GWS) results
enrichTest2_Perm()
Permutation analysis of the enrichment test II
gene2Set()
Map a gene to its MSigDB gene sets
gene2snp
Map Genes to SNPs
getChrs()
Chromosome ID
getEnrich2P()
Get permutation p-value of enrichment test II
getGeneMap()
Get gene map information
getGeneMeasure()
Get gene measures from GWAS SNP associations
getGeneSetInfo()
Get a gene set/pathway information
getRegionGene()
Get genes in a genomic region
getRegionSNP()
Get SNPs in a genomic region
getSNPMap()
Get SNP map position
getSetGenes()
Get genes belonging to a given category of gene set or pathway
getSetType()
List MSigDB gene-set categories
msigdb_build()
Build pathway annotation database from MSigDB gene sets
set2Gene()
Map a gene set to genes
setID2setType()
map a gene-set/pathway ID to a gene-set category
setType2setID()
Get gene sets of a MSigDB gene-set category
snp2Gene()
Map SNPs to Genes
uscore()
Uniform score calculation
